main event: An Ottawa, Ohio resident reported seeing a bright, oblong-shaped object with colored lights traveling towards the north on March 30, 1966.
interesting points: The object started off slow but rapidly increased in speed.
The object was estimated to be about the size of a house.
The object took off when a backfire occurred.
The witness reported a sense of fear and apprehension during the sighting.
The witness felt the sighting should have received a more immediate and thorough investigation.
sighted object: a bright, oblong-shaped object with colored lights
